name: Rogue In The Void
description:
Rogue In The Void is a classic turn-based roguelike taking place aboard a commercial space station seized by a rogue A.I. A twist of fate sees you as the only crewmember with an intact mind as everyone else has been enslaved by the A.I. Acquire various weapons and tools to help you navigate the once lively corridors and survive the onslaught of human puppets, mechs, and worse, all of whom now care about only one thing: to eliminate the anomaly.
If you want to survive, you'll have to fight your former coworkers and hack the A.I.'s terminals to deprive it of control, but remember—if you die, all your past efforts are erased.Features
  • True roguelike – turn-based combat on a square grid, permadeath, replayability
  • A compelling antagonist – the more you play, the more you discover
  • Tactical combat – approach any situation however you want
  • A procedurally generated station – every new game is a unique experience
  • Loot – find new weapons, upgrades, and implants to maximize your chances of survival
  • Play wherever, whenever you want – touch / keyboard / gamepad controls
  • Atmospheric retrowave graphics – runs even on integrated graphics cards
  • New Game+ with highscore leaderboards
